contexts.context: ...giant native mushrooms. Telvanni villages are comprised of <mark>smaller</mark> mushroom pods hollowed out for craftsmen and commoners....
...well. Commodities at reasonable prices, but with <mark>smaller</mark> selections, are available from the smith, clothier...
...mines, and sold everywhere in Morrowind; the <mark>smaller</mark> eggs retain properties lost in later states of gestation...
